body_html:
@colesbury, also, please note that you cannot just take the first result of cudnnFind like here or in similar places:
https://github.com/qunluo/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/cudnn/Conv.cpp#L130
You have to check the status field of perfResults to be CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS. What I suspect was happening here is because cudnnFind call got OOM, the fields in the perfResults were populated with garbage.
